sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const DisplayPosts = ({abc,test,data,del}) => { console.log(data) console.log(abc) const filteredPosts=data.filter((a)=>a.id===abc) console.log(filteredPosts) return(

ID: {abc}

Title: {filteredPosts.title}

Category: {filteredPosts.category}

Text:{filteredPosts.text}

) }; export default DisplayPosts;
